name: Die Trying (VoidGoat)
description:
Die Trying - GMTK 2022

Use magical dice to fight of enemies and alter the dungeon around you.

Controls: 

WASD - to move

Left Mouse Button - to use ability

Q/E or Mouse Wheel Up/Down - to change ability

M or Tab - to view map

F  - to toggle fullscreen

Follow me on twitter for more game experiments: https://twitter.com/VoidGoatDev
